name: 8 Words Apart
description:
Guess the 8 words hidden in each picture.
Watch the picture. Click on the right letters until you will solve the whole puzzle

--- A SIMPLE AND FUN BRAINTEASER ! ---

The rules are simple: 1 image, 1 puzzle of letters, 8 words to guess.
Click on the right letters and find out the 8 words hidden in each image.
Once all 8 words are found, the next image is unlocked.
And so on through a cerebral journey rich in varied and colorful photos.

--- HUNDREDS OF VARIED LEVELS ---

Animals, objects, cooking, landscapes, holidays, people, sports, travel, art, design, celebrities ...
Hundreds of different images will put your sense of observation and vocabulary to the test.
With a new challenge to each image:
Can you guess each of the 8 words of the puzzle?

--- IDEAL FOR BREAKS! ---

With hundreds of original images, 8 Words Coupes offers many levels of difficulty specially designed to entertain fans of letter games and hidden object games.

Ideal for a coffee break, train trip or even boring meetings!

--- FREE DOWNLOAD ---

"8 words cut" is part of the "8 words" collection which totals more than 2 million downloads worldwide.
